mapper.sql: SELECT a.order_status, b.order_seq, b.op_count, b.created_at, c.product_name, c.product_cost, d.image_name FROM tbl_order a, tbl_op b, tbl_product c, tbl_image d WHERE #{alias} = a.user_seq AND a.order_seq = b.order_seq AND b.product_seq = c.product_seq AND c.product_seq = d.product_seq ORDER BY created_at DESC
